description:
When Akari opens the fridge, she sees that there is no more blood.
But when Sophie tries to order it on her regular delivery site, she`s met with a note that the service is currently inoperational.
Searching on other sites doesn`t yield any results either. The next idea is to have Erie share some of hers, but she`s also out.
Everybody is agonizing about what to do when Erie starts talking about finding a human downtown who wants to have their blood sucked...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La ronde des saisons et le vampire
The Vampire and the Changing Seasons
